DOC.brief_summary: In this randomized controlled trial, we will examine the effect of a 3-month exercise training (aerobic exercise versus resistance exercise) without calorie restriction on total and regional adiposity, and risk of type 2 diabetes in overweight children and adolescents.
DOC.brief_title: Physical Activity in Youth: Implications for Reversing Risk Factors for Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Healthy overweight (BMI >95th) youth between 12 and 18 years of age Waist circumference >75th percentile Sedentary (no structured exercise >2 times/week for past 6 months) Nonsmokers, nondiabetic, no medical conditions Weight stable for past 3 months Smokers, diabetic, psychiatric disorders, syndromatic obesity
